basics.name: Ethan Bonsignori
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: A detail-oriented web developer and IT Technician with a love for problem-solving and helping people.

work.summary: Handled IT requests via call and email. Worked with department managers to design and create web apps that would assist with day-to-day operations.
highlights: Wrote step-by-step guides for new device setup as well as troubleshooting guides for common IT problems.
Created and managed several Excel spreadsheets that automated financial receipts and recurring monthly bills

Created an inventory and notification utility to track expensive equipment and notify responsible parties of calibration due dates. Built custom table and wizard-style form with React.js for displaying and collecting data.

work.summary: Spent several years in the Entertainment and Hospitality industry
highlights: Programmed, troubleshot, and fixed complex stage lights.
Assisted patrons with any emergent issues.

work.summary: Created promotional materials for local non-profits and businesses.
highlights: Taught myself tools such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.

references.name: Dustin Sparks
references.reference: Taught the bootcamp I attended. Contact email: pixelmixer@gmail.com
